comments_since_last_sample.body: Are yall ready for a new variant? 😁😂

I'll tell you why cases are dropping, it's because these psychopaths have gotten bored, but don't worry it won't last long. In a few weeks a new variant will emerge out of nowhere and they will start with the cases up and people dying bs.
Of course it's decreasing trump said herd immunity we should go for fouchi said no so what did you expect. Remember bird flu is on the rise in China don't get to optimistic.

Delta Plus is on the way. Already detected in countries around the world and the numbers are climbing quickly. Lockdown by Christmas. This is just the lull before the storm. Even the fascists need a break now and then before putting the boot down harder.
So Natural Immunity is effective?  No need to be mandated to get vaccinated then.
YOU CAN LEARN A LOT FROM A DUMMY BUCKLE YOUR SAFETY BELT
WE ARE NOT OUT OF THE WOODS YET
When they turn off the TV and Radio's what will you do lol .
Democratic Party is trying to bring America 🇺🇸down into Bankruptcy!!!
